common_2020_esper_010_esper_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Oh? If it isn’t [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. It’s
been\r
too long.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_02:
Your beauty has become even more refined since
the last time we met.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_03a:
Oh! Accepting compliments with grace, I see.
How wonderful. I hope you remain that way.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_03b:
Who taught you the art of flattery? Is my young
friend all grown up now?[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_04: So you’re here in place of Geeta, are you?[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_05:
Just between you and me, I’m not exactly her
biggest fan. That bewitching aura of hers\r
overlaps too much with my own style.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_06:
So it may be for the best that she sent someone
else for the job.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_07:
With you, I feel like I can really give this battle
all I’ve got.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_08:
Without further ado, are you ready to pursue
quintessential beauty together?[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_retry:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]. Are you ready
to\r
pursue\r
quintessential beauty together?[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_09: Oh, wonderful. Let’s head to the battle court.[VAR 0114(001C)]
common_2020_esper_010_esper_10:
I’m very busy, you know. Come right back
chop-chop, would you?[VAR 0114(001C)]
